attributes.action: make the wearing of helmets compulsory for winter sports activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After todays tragic news it is high time that a law was introduced to make the wearing of helmets compulsory during winter sports activities.

Insurance policies should state that a helmet is compulsory and choosing not to wear one could invalidate cover.

It should no longer be a question of fashion not to wear one.
